dataDescriptions.axisPadding: percentage of diagram space between the primary and secondary and primary and stratigraphy axes
dataDescriptions.canvasPadding: percentage of space between the stratigraphy column or primary axis and the first curve axis
dataDescriptions.curvePadding: percentage of diagram space between the curve max and the next curves axis
dataDescriptions.Ygrouping: percentage of diagram space allotted to the grouping on the top
dataDescriptions.Ynames: percentage of diagram space allotted to top names
dataDescriptions.Ybottom: percentage of diagram space allotted to the bottom labels
dataDescriptions.primaryAxis: percentage of diagram space allotted to the primary axis area
dataDescriptions.secondaryAxis: percentage of diagram space allotted to the secondary axis area, if it exists
dataDescriptions.stratigraphyCol: percentage of diagram space to be allotted to the stratigraphy column, if it exists
dataDescriptions.defaultPadding: percentage of diagram space allotted to spacing between names
dataDescriptions.titleTop: percentage of diagram space between the top of the plot and the top of the plot title
dataDescriptions.titleLeft: percentage of diagram between the left of the plot and the start of the plot title
dataDescriptions.namePadding: percentage of diagram space between the top of diagram and the start of the name in the Y direction
